  • Constructor Details

    • Point

      public Point​(int x, int y)
      Instantiates a new point.
      Parameters:
      x - : coordinate X in frame
      y - : coordinate Y in frame

  • Method Details

    • getX

      Gets the x coordinate
      Returns:
      x coordinate

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Gets the y coordinate
      Returns:
      y coordinate

    • lockDirection

      public void lockDirection​(java.lang.String direction)
      Lock point directions change in lockDirections HashMap the key (direction) value by true
      Parameters:
      direction - : can be UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT,UPLEFT,UPRIGHT,DOWNLEFT,DOWNRIGHT

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked​(java.lang.String direction)
      Checks if the point is locked in the given direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - : can be UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT,UPLEFT,UPRIGHT,DOWNLEFT,DOWNRIGHT
      Returns:
      true if the direction is locked, else false

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked​(int dirX, int dirY)
      Checks if the point is locked in the line direction
      Parameters:
      dirX - : 1 for HORI, RISE, and FALL, 0 for VERTI
      dirY - : 0 for HORI, -1 for RISE, 1 for FALL and VERTI
      Returns:
      true if the point is locked in the line direction, else false

    • copyDirections

      public void copyDirections​(Point p)
      Copy point (on param) directions
      Parameters:
      p - : Point to copy
